text: Making the Grade is a 1929 American comedy film directed by Alfred E. Green and starring Lois Moran, Edmund Lowe and Lucien Littlefield.Solomon p.313 ==Cast== * Lois Moran as Lettie Ewing * Edmund Lowe as Herbert Littell Dodsworth * Lucien Littlefield as Silas Cooper * Al Hart as Lawyer * James Ford as Bud Davison * Rolfe Sedan as Valet * John Alden as Egbert Williamson * Sherman Ross as Arthur Burdette * Gino Conti as Frank Dinwiddie * Mary Ashley as Lettie's Friend * Lia Torá as Another Girl Friend ==References== ==Bibliography== * Solomon, Aubrey. The Fox Film Corporation, 1915-1935: A History and Filmography. McFarland, 2011. ==External links== * Category:1929 films Category:American films Category:American comedy films Category:American black-and-white films Category:1929 comedy films Category:English-language films Category:Films directed by Alfred E. Green Category:Fox Film films Category:Films made before the MPAA Production Code
title: Making the Grade (1929 film)
